root.name: Kidz Sports: Ice Hockey
root.description: Gameplay The game features motion controls which are used to control a team of three skaters plus a goalie. There is a 'Skill Meter' that fills up and allows a player to shoot an unstoppable shot. Game Modes The game offers Exhibition, Knockout Cup, and Tournament Cup modes as well as a handful of Mini-Games. The game also offers local 2-player competitive multiplayer.
